name: fde
description: Lightweight deployment system built with Bun and TypeScript
author: Yu Chen <me@yuchen.tech>

scripts.build:all: bun run build:mac && bun run build:linux && bun run build:windows
scripts.build:mac: bun run build:mac:arm64 && bun run build:mac:x64
scripts.build:linux: bun run build:linux:arm64 && bun run build:linux:x64
scripts.build:mac:arm64: bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile=dist/fde-server-macos-arm64 src/server/index.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile=dist/fde-client-macos-arm64 src/client/index.ts
scripts.build:mac:x64: bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=dist/fde-server-macos-x64 src/server/index.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=dist/fde-client-macos-x64 src/client/index.ts
scripts.build:linux:arm64: bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile=dist/fde-server-linux-arm64 src/server/index.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile=dist/fde-client-linux-arm64 src/client/index.ts
scripts.build:linux:x64: bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=dist/fde-server-linux-x64 src/server/index.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=dist/fde-client-linux-x64 src/client/index.ts
scripts.build:windows:x64: bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/fde-server-windows-x64.exe src/server/index.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/fde-client-windows-x64.exe src/client/index.ts
